resources.string: This Artwork is by Jackson Pollock
This is an app resume.I Hope you like it

"Have an interest in Software, Culture, Science and Philosophy and enjoy pursuing tiny technical/creative DIY projects.


"
"Been exposed to nascent technologies like Big-Data encryption ,CX(Oracle Service Cloud) and a bunch of new APIs from Java EE and .NET.


"
"Inspirational personalities I look up to include Subramanyan Chandrasekhar, Stephen Hawking, Anthony Keidis, Roger Waters and Larry Ellison."
